name: SmallBusinessVideoMarketingTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: By asking Alexa for Small Business Video Marketing Tips, you will be given weekly tips on how best to use video to market your business. You will learn strategies for uploading videos, ranking videos so that they can be found online, creating engaging videos, and everything you need to do to use video to bring in more clients and customers to your business.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
